originalText.text: Tom is a phenomenal broker. We've been looking for an apartment for months and have come across 30+ brokers. Tom, by far, has been the absolute best. Touring the apartment went smoothly. He was readily available by phone when I had follow up questions. Once we got approved, Tom was also able to facilitate a more convenient start date for us  Cannot recommend him enough!

He was readily available by phone when I had follow up questions. Once we got approved, Tom was also able to facilitate a more convenient start date for us  Cannot recommend him enough!

originalText.text: My boyfriend and I had specific needs when looking for an apartment. We met Cecilio Davis to view a few apartments. After meeting, he was able to get a great understanding of our needs and wants. He was able to find us the perfect apartment! The lease signing process with Tom was very easy and painless. We would definitely recommend working with Metropolis again!

text.text: My boyfriend and I had specific needs when looking for an apartment. We met Cecilio Davis to view a few apartments. After meeting, he was able to get a great understanding of our needs and wants. He was able to find us the perfect apartment! The lease signing process with Tom was very easy and painless. We would definitely recommend working with Metropolis again!

originalText.text: My husband and I worked with Cecilio Davis to find our apartment. Working with Cecilio was not like the previous experiences I had with NYC brokers (who posted stock pictures of apartments and bombarded me with emails and text message all hours of the day and night).  Cecilio did not pressure us to take the apartment he showed us and he was knowledgeable about the apartment building and the application process. Two days after we saw the apartment we were signing the lease.  The whole process was stress-free and pleasant. I would be happy to work with Cecilio again and would recommend him to friends.

text.text: My husband and I worked with Cecilio Davis to find our apartment. originalText.text: I highly recommend Cecilio Davis and Metropolis Real Estate! Relocating to NYC from out of state is incredibly hectic and working with Cecilio felt like I hit the jackpot. First and foremost, he was incredibly knowledgeable, punctual, and professional. He was able to accommodate a really fast timeline and had me signing the lease 7 hours after first viewing the apartment...and 6 hours after I submitted my application. Cecilio was also honest and direct (which was so refreshing after experiences with other brokers) and his friendly demeanor helped ease my anxiety about the intricacies of the NYC rental market.  I very much appreciated him keeping me updated on the status of my application throughout the day since I was trying to catch a flight immediately after signing the lease. I would absolutely work with him again in the future!

originalText.text:
I worked with Cecilio Davis last week to secure a very nice studio on West 57th Street, and I had a great experience with him. Having lived in Manhattan for 9 years, I have met a fair amount of brokers and seen quite a number of apartments. I thought Cecilio was honest, fair and straight forward, and I had a good vibe about him from the first meet. I really appreciate that he told me right up front what he thought he could and could not negotiate with the building owners. He was very friendly and responsive immediately. He knows the Manhattan market well.
I did not feel that he was trying to push me to make a sale. I think Cecilio understands that building relationships with clients is more important than duping them into an unhappy purchase. I have already recommended him to another friend, and would not hesitate to do so again.
